Interface ec.e.file.EFileInfo

public interface EFileInfo
extends Object
Common interface for directory entries that may be examined for file info.

lastModified()
Determines the time that the file represented by this object was last modified.
length()
Length in bytes of this file.

length 
  public abstract long length()
Length in bytes of this file.
lastModified 
  public abstract long lastModified()
Determines the time that the file represented by this object was last modified. As per the Java class library spec, the return value is system-dependent and should only be used to compare with other values returned by lastModified(). It should not be interpreted as an absolute time.
Returns:
the "time" the file specified by this object was last modified
